page.title: 02JUSTYN'S DAY. AGED 6
page.content: In the morning I wake up and I play for about half an hour. For my breakfast I have cereal, sometimes toast and a cup of tea to drink. Then I get dressed and go to school. We play in the playground until the bell rings, then we have lessons. At 12 o'clock we have our dinner and after that we go out to play. When we come inside we go to the toilets and wash our hands. Then we line up at the door, and after that we go in to the classroom and read our books while we wait for Mrs Butterworth to arrive. Next we start work again. Later we go out to play again and then we have a story read. At 3.30p.m. we go home and I watch television while my mummy makes the tea. After that I go upstairs and have a wash. I put on my pyjamas and say my prayers and then I fall asleep. Zzzz.
